# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe it would greatly benefit you and enhance your daily activities. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $200. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
